name: Global Underwater Awareness Association
goal:
The primary mission is to reduce the amount of toxic and non-degradable waste in the oceans, lakes, and rivers by taking direct action, and to invent other future solutions to stop and reduce the pollution.
Our vision is to unite all the countries, corporations, and governments worldwide to work together effectively as an alliance and achieve visual results.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Development, Education, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives:
Taking out more than 1000 tons of toxic waste each year by our professional divers team.
Promoting and raising awareness via various media channels, as well as direct education of local communities.
Representing the friendship and promoting tolerance among people across the planet.
